name: RetrieveOrderCustomAttribute
description:
Retrieve a custom attribute for a specified order.

Use this tool to get a custom attribute linked to an order. It can also retrieve the custom attribute definition if needed. Visibility settings determine if attributes from other applications can be accessed.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the target order to retrieve the custom attribute for.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: The key for the custom attribute to retrieve, matching an existing attribute definition key.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to retrieve.  This key must match the key of an
existing custom attribute definition.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_version
parameters.description: Specify the current version of the custom attribute for optimistic concurrency control.

value_schema.description:
To enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control, include this optional field and specify the current version of the custom attribute.

parameters.name: include_custom_attribute_definition
parameters.description: Set to true to include custom attribute definition details such as name, description, and data type. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether to return the [custom attribute definition](entity:CustomAttributeDefinition) in the `definition` field of each 
custom attribute. Set this parameter to `true` to get the name and description of each custom attribute, 
information about the data type, or other definition details. The default value is `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description:
To enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control, include this optional field and specify the current version of the custom attribute.

value_schema.description:
To enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency)
control, include this optional field and specify the current version of the custom attribute.

parameters.name: with_definition
parameters.description:
Indicates whether to return the [custom attribute definition](entity:CustomAttributeDefinition) in the `definition` field of each 
custom attribute. Set this parameter to `true` to get the name and description of each custom attribute, 
information about the data type, or other definition details. The default value is `false`.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether to return the [custom attribute definition](entity:CustomAttributeDefinition) in the `definition` field of each 
custom attribute. Set this parameter to `true` to get the name and description of each custom attribute, 
information about the data type, or other definition details. The default value is `false`.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description:
The key of the custom attribute to retrieve.  This key must match the key of an
existing custom attribute definition.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to retrieve.  This key must match the key of an
existing custom attribute definition.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
